last_episode_to_air.name: What's in the Kitty?
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Hollisters' dinner party for Dick's boss is marred by a mouse, a sick cat and a poison scare.

name: He & She
overview:
He & She is an American sitcom that aired on the CBS television network as part of its 1967-1968 lineup, originally sponsored by General Foods and Lever Brothers.

He & She is widely considered to be ahead of its time by broadcast historians. Its sophisticated approach to comedy was viewed as opening doors to the groundbreaking MTM family of sitcoms of the 1970s, beginning with The Mary Tyler Moore Show in 1970. The character of Oscar was openly the pattern for the Ted Baxter character, for which creator Leonard Stern granted permission.

CBS aired reruns of He & She in prime time from June 1970 to September 1970.

episodes.name: The Old Man and the She
episodes.overview: Paula forces Dick into helping an old Greek gentleman from being deported.

episodes.name: The Second Time Around
episodes.overview: The Hollisters plan a second wedding with all the fuss and formality they didn't have at the first one.

episodes.name: How to Fail in Business
episodes.overview: Dick and Paula buy their apartment building but regret it when the tenants complain constantly.

episodes.name: Phantom of 84th Street
episodes.overview: Oscar's $65,000 Picasso is stolen from Dick and Paula's apartment.

episodes.name: One of Our Firemen is Missing
episodes.overview: Harry is fined for helping Dick and Paula when he should have been on duty.

episodes.name: Before You Bury Me, Can I Say Something?
episodes.overview: When Dick writes his will, Paula thinks he's dying.

episodes.name: Dick's Van Dyke
episodes.overview: Dick plans to spend his vacation time painting, but he is constantly being interrupted.

episodes.name: The Background Man
episodes.overview: Dick hires a girl to help him draw the comic strip.  Unfortunately, all she can do is spill paint all over him.

episodes.name: Vote Yes or No
episodes.overview: Paula pickets Dick's office because he is against a pay raise for firemen and she is for it.

episodes.name: He & She vs. Him
episodes.overview: Dick has run out of ideas for the comic strip and is about to be sued for plagiarism.

episodes.name: The Coming-Out Party
episodes.overview: Paula throws a party so she can match her friend up with a doctor.  However, the doctor has plans to take out Dick's tonsils.

episodes.name: Deep in the Heart of Taxes
episodes.overview: Dick is about to be audited by the IRS and Paula hasn't told him about all the money she won on the horses.

episodes.name: Don't Call Us
episodes.overview: The Hollisters are having a problem getting an invitation to a party because they have just gotten an unlisted phone number.

episodes.name: North Goes West
episodes.overview: Oscar insists that Dick and Paula move out to California with him and the "Jetman" series.  So they pick up and prepare to move out.

episodes.name: Easy Way Out
episodes.overview: When the police raid Paula's poker party, Oscar manages to make a Jetman-like getaway.

episodes.name: Poster Boy
episodes.overview: A wanted poster of the neighborhood robber looks just like Andrew, the building handyman.

episodes.name: 45 Midgets from Broadway
episodes.overview: The "Jetman" show is made into a musical comedy.

episodes.name: A Rock by Any Other Name
episodes.overview: The Hollisters exchange birthday gifts: She gets a fur coat and he gets a rock, which he proceeds to lose.

episodes.name: Goodman, Spare That Tree
episodes.overview: Paula helps her cousin smuggle an Italian olive tree past customs. The big problem now is keeping the tree alive.

episodes.name: The White Collar Worker
episodes.overview: The Hollisters prepare to confront the driver who hit Paula's car.

episodes.name: Along Came Kim
episodes.overview: The Hollisters' Korean foster son mistakes Harry for his foster father.

episodes.name: What Do You Get for the Man Who Has Nothing?
episodes.overview: The Hollisters try to keep Harry out of his apartment for three days so they can redecorate it for a surprise birthday party.

episodes.name: Dog's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Dick and Paula watch as their close friends Bart and Myra split up.

episodes.name: It's Not Whether You Win or Lose, It's How You Watch the Game
episodes.overview: Dick has to get 30 tickets to a football game in two days. He had promised his classmates they would hold their reunion at the game but he forgot to reserve the seats.

episodes.name: Knock, Knock, Who's There? Fernando, Fernando Who?
episodes.overview: Harry jumps to the wrong conclusion when he finds Fernando Lamas massaging Paula's leg while Dick is out of town.

episodes.name: What's in the Kitty?
episodes.overview: The Hollisters' dinner party for Dick's boss is marred by a mouse, a sick cat and a poison scare.
